text: Ngakube balinde okunye ngaphandle kokuthi zize kubona izingelosi noma kuze iNkosi yakho uqobo noma kuze amanye amavesi eNkosi yakho ngosuku lapho kuza khona amanye amavesi eNkosi yakho, lapho umphefumulo ungeke usizwe ukukholwa kwawo (umphefumulo) owawungazange ukholwe ngaphambilini noma ungazange wenze okuhle ekukholweni kwawo. Ithi “lindani nathi singabalindileyo”
